title: Test result
description: Test result for a single test. Smallest unit of all result objects.

name.description: Display name of the test. E.g. name of a test function/method/procedure/script.

state.description: The state this result terminated in.

points.description: Amount of points awarded for this test.

maxPoints.description: Maximum amount of possible points from passing this test.

testOutput.description: Preformatted string that contains test output that should be shown as feedback. E.g. a single line from a full traceback string.

fullTestOutput.description: Full output from a single test, useful e.g. if the test output printed by a test method is too verbose for testOutput.

header.description: Optional message to display above testOutput

footer.description: Optional message to display below testOutput
